Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

This is my KSP Christmas special. After 4 years of playing KSP, I have learned one thing: It is awesome. Truly awesome. But I have never done a holiday special. And that is why I am here, to give you guys some happiness for the holidays. So without further ado:

A Kerbal Christmas

 

Gene looked over the plans for Canopus Station, over and over again. He sighed, tired, frustrated. He needed a holiday. Christmas. That was what it was called. But how to celebrate it?

Your turn, guys! Come up with a Christmas Kerbal celebration, run it by me, and I might implement it!

Edited December 25, 2015 by Kekkie
